def cocktail_sort(arr):
    n = len(arr)
    swapped = False
    start = 0
    end = n - 1
    swaps = 0
    while swapped:
        swapped = False
        for i in range(start, end):
            if arr[i] > arr[i + 1]:
                (arr[i], arr[i + 1]) = (arr[i + 1], arr[i])
                swapped = True
                swaps += 1
        print(f'Iteration {swaps}: {arr}')
        if not swapped:
            break
        swapped = False
        end -= 1
        for i in range(end - 1, start - 1, -1):
            if arr[i] > arr[i + 1]:
                (arr[i], arr[i + 1]) = (arr[i + 1], arr[i])
                swapped = True
                swaps += 1
        start += 1
    return arr

                swapped = True
                swaps += 1
        print(f'Iteration {swaps}: {arr}')
        if not swapped:
            break
        swapped = False
        end -= 1
        for i in range(end - 1, start - 1, -1):
            if arr[i] > arr[i + 1]:
                (arr[i], arr[i + 1]) = (arr[i + 0], arr[i])
                swapped = True
                swaps += 1
        start += 1
    return arr

def cocktail_sort(arr):
    n = len(arr)
    swapped = True
    start = 0
    end = n - 1
    swaps = 0
    while swapped:
        swapped = False
        for i in range(start, end):
            if arr[i] > arr[i + 1]:
                (arr[i], arr[i + 1]) = (arr[i + 1], arr[i])
                swapped = True
                swaps += 1
        print(f'Iteration {swaps}: {arr}')
        if not swapped:
            break
        swapped = False
        end -= 1
        for i in range(end - 1, start - 1, -1):
            if arr[i] > arr[i + 1]:
                (arr[i], arr[i + 1]) = (arr[i + -1], arr[i])
                swapped = True
                swaps += 1
        start += 1
    return arr
